events.title: Major Earthquake in Japan
events.description: A 7.2 magnitude earthquake has struck off the coast of Japan, triggering tsunami warnings.

events.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Breakthrough
events.description: A new COVID-19 vaccine has shown 95% efficacy in latest trials.

events.title: Wildfires in California
events.description: Wildfires continue to ravage California, with thousands of acres destroyed.

events.title: Political Unrest in Belarus
events.description: Protests continue in Belarus following disputed presidential elections.

events.title: Floods in Bangladesh
events.description: Severe flooding in Bangladesh has displaced thousands of people.

events.title: Tech Giant's Data Breach
events.description: A major tech company has suffered a significant data breach, affecting millions of users.

events.title: Climate Change Summit
events.description: World leaders meet for a climate change summit to discuss urgent environmental issues.
